original_text: You will plant many seeds in your fields, but you will not have much food at harvest time. Instead, locusts will eat your crops.
korean_text: 네가 많은 종자를 들에 뿌릴지라도 메뚜기가 먹으므로 거둘 것이 적을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will plant many seeds in your fields
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 밭에 많은 씨를 심을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but you will not have much food at harvest time
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 수확할 때에 음식이 많지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, locusts will eat your crops
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 메뚜기들이 당신의 곡식을 먹을 것입니다
